description: Number of n-block T_0-covers of a labeled set.
comments: A cover of a set is a T_0-cover if for every two distinct points of the set there exists a member (block) of the cover containing one but not the other point.
maple: with(combinat): Digits := 1500: f := n->(-1)^n+(1/n!)*sum(stirling1(n+1,i)*floor((2^(i-1)-1)!*exp(1)), i=2..n+1): for n from 1 to 10 do printf(`%d,`,f(n)) od:
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Jan 18 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Jan 24 2001
